author: James Martin
method: Preheat the oven to 220C/425F/Gas 7. Heat the Kirsch and sugar in an ovenproof frying pan until the sugar has dissolved. Add the cherries and then transfer to the oven and bake for 5-6 minutes. Pour into a bowl and serve.
ingredients: 1 miniature Kirsch,  1 tbsp caster sugar,  1 x 400g/14oz can of cherries
